data.name: Vicious Growth
data.detailed_description:
Action RPG Roguelike. Evolve your abilities and push yourself through a procedurally generated level.
Think hard about your choices, itemize well and use your skills to reach the end.



Start with a few basic abilities and fight your way through increasingly difficult enemies to upgrade your abilities and loot gear.
Pick your favourite ability combinations and create unique builds with items that you find along the way.



Your upgradable abilities consist of:
* Spell (default attack)
* Dash
* AOE Nova



What type of player do you want to be? Will you dash into a big group of mobs, praying that your raw damage will save you? Do you build movement speed and choose crowd control upgrades to strategically kite mobs around the room?

It's up to you, there are no wrong ways to play the game.
Well... Perhaps a few.
